text: Magnús Örn Eyjólfsson Scheving (born 10 November 1964) is an Icelandic writer, actor, producer, entrepreneur, and athlete. He is the creator, CEO & Co- founder of Lazytown Entertainment, from which he is the creator and co-star of the children's television show LazyTown, in which he starred as Sportacus. Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Icelandic writers Category:Icelandic businesspeople Category:Television actors Category:Television producers
title: Magnús Scheving
